TextBlock.Text: PYE: Station log 192. Construction is on schedule, and all readings so far are well within our expected parameters. However, I have concerns about my colleague's state of mind.

PYE: For a few weeks now, I've observed troubling symptoms. These include, but are not limited to, daydreaming, pleasant remarks, contented sighing, general gooiness, and I'm sad to report, even smiling.
PYE: I believe this behaviour started as a result of him getting a new <color=pink>BOYFRIEND</color>!
PYE: In fact, just saying his name brings on an attack of furious blushing! It's adorable.
PYE: I propose a treatment plan of constant teasing and endless pestering.
IDAEA: How long can I expect to put up with this?
PYE: Oh, you have no idea, Idaea.
IDAEA: Oh. Ha ha, very funny.
IDAEA: I am not blushing. Or adorable.
